Author: mrlynch#5735
Content: @Nitego yes

Author: mrlynch#5735
Content:
@javita 
1. create new seed in verus agama - backup seed and copy address
2. logout
3. import old agama seed in verus agama
4. send funds to the newly created safe address
5. logout
6. log back in with safe seed

Author: mrlynch#5735
Content:
for anyone that gets the invalid pub error for chips
https://github.com/DeckerSU/chips3/releases/tag/v0.14.99_decker_2
if you have wif key and NOT seed go to help > debug > console and type
`importprivkey yourWifHere`

send to new chips address
